# Build folders
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio cache/options directory
.vs/

# Rider / JetBrains
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Logs
*.log

# Auto-generated files
GeneratedFiles/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
*.swp
*.sln.docstates

# Test results
TestResult*/
[Bb]uild[Ll]og.*
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
*.testresult.xml

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
packages/
# except build/, which is used by some projects
!**/packages/build/
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# Tooling
/.vs/
/.vscode/

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.jfm
*.pdb

# Publish output
publish/
